title: S2 E13: Lights, Camera...Homicidio with Andy Berman
description:
In this week's episode, Maggie and Tim are joined by the hilarious Andy Berman to talk about Season 2 Episode 13: Lights, Camera...Homicidio. The episode where Shawn and Gus investigate a murder on the set of a hit telenovela.
